description: In “Buyer & Cellar,” Michael Urie plays Alex, an actor who works in Barbra Streisand’s basement, and Barry, his boyfriend who’s worked up about the star’s relationship to her hometown, Brooklyn.
title: In Performance: Michael Urie
title_page: In Performance: Michael Urie - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Stripped of costumes and props, today’s best-known artists from the Broadway stage and Carnegie Hall offer intimate and thrilling performances for the camera.
